Post.title: GitHub Actions + Github Pages
Post._content:
GitHub Actions: GitHub Actions  GitHub Actions  

GitHub  actions[GitHub Actions](https://docs.github.com/cn/actions/learn-github-actions/introduction-to-github-actions)
<!--more -->

## Hexo 

Hexo [hexo ](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/index.html)

Github Pages 
- User or organization site:  username.github.io 
- Project site:  Setting => pages 

Github Pages [](https://pages.github.com/)

 Project site  Hexo  **_config.yml**  deploy  MalBlog/gh-pages 
``` yml
deploy:
  type: 'git'
  repository: 
    github: git@github.com:MaLuns/MalBlog.gitgh-pages
  branch: master
```
 **hexo generate**  **hexo deploy** 

## GitHub Actions

GitHub Actions  **hexo generate****hexo deploy**   .github/workflows   main.yml .yml  Action   Action   workflow job step

 
```yml
# 
name: Hexo Deploy

# 
on:
  # masterpush 
  push:
    branches: [ master ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ master ]
```
  job

```yml
jons:
    # job1
    blog-cicd:
        # 
        name: Hexo blog build & deploy
        # 
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest #  Ubuntu 

    # jon2 job
    job2:
```
  
=>  Hexo  =>  =>  =>  

```yml
jons:
    blog-cicd:
        name: Hexo blog build & deploy
        runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
    #  checkout@2 
    - name: Checkout codes
      uses: actions/checkout@v2 
      with: 
        submodules: true

    #  setup-node@v1  node.js 
    - name: Setup node
      uses: actions/setup-node@v1
      with:
        node-version: '12.x'

    #  Hexo 
    - name: Install hexo dependencies
      env:
        #   
        ACTION_DEPLOY_KEY: ${{ secrets.HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI }}
      #  ssh   hexo-cli  
      run: |
        mkdir -p ~/.ssh/
        echo "$ACTION_DEPLOY_KEY" > ~/.ssh/id_rsa
        chmod 600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa
        ssh-keyscan github.com >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
        git config --global user.email "userEmail"
        git config --global user.name "userName"
        npm install -g hexo-cli
        npm install

    #   
    - name: Generate files
      run: |
        hexo clean
        hexo generate
        hexo deploy
```
Github  **Deploy keys**   **SSH Key**  Setting => Deploy   Setting => Secrets => Actions   **{{ secrets.XXXXX }}**  **Secrets**  **HEXO_DEPLOY_PRI** 


## Git submodule

 **Git submodule** 
```shell
git submodule add <> <>
```

```yml
#  git submodule update --recursive --remote 
#  git pull ...   git clone 
# 
- name: Generate files
    run: |
         cd ./themes/
        rm -r hexo-theme-text
        git clone https://github.com/MaLuns/hexo-theme-text.git
        cd ../../
        hexo clean
        hexo generate
        hexo deploy

#  git chekout 
- name: Generate files
    run: |
        cd ./themes/hexo-theme-text
        git checkout -q master
        cd ../../
        hexo clean
        hexo generate
        hexo deploy
```

``` js
//extension.js 

// 
function activate(context) {
    console.log('Congratulations, your extension "vscode-demo" is now active!');

    // 
    let disposable = vscode.commands.registerCommand('vscode-demo.helloWorld', function () {
        //
        vscode.window.showInformationMessage('Hello World from vscode-demo!');
    });

    context.subscriptions.push(disposable);
}

// 
function deactivate() {}

module.exports = {
    activate,
    deactivate
}
```

###  

  router.meta 
include 

``` html
<template>
    <keep-alive :include="include">
        <router-view />
    </keep-alive>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                include: []
            }
        },
        watch: {
            $route(route) {
                let { meta } = route
                if (meta.cache && !this.include.includes(meta.name)) {
                    this.include.push(meta.name)
                }
            }
        }
    }
</script>

// route 
[{
    path: 'home',
    name: "home",
    meta:{
        name:'',
        cache:true  //
    },
    component: () => import('@/views/home')
},{
    path: '/login',
    name: 'login',
    meta:{
        name:'',
        cache:true
    },
    component: () => import('@/views/login'),
}]
```
